==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|懈怠 (法学)|懈怠 (Legal)}}
{{wikipedia|Laches (equity)}}
{{wikipedia|Negligence}}
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|かい|たい}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かいたい}} compound {{m|zh|懈怠|tr=hɛ<sup>X</sup> doi<sup>X</sup>|lit=idle + negligent}}. The [[漢音#Japanese|''kan'on'']], so likely a later borrowing.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|かいたい|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かいたい}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=かいたい|legal}} [[laches]]: a kind of [[lapse]] wherein an opposing party has neglected to invoke its rights within a certain period of time
# {{lb|ja|sort=かいたい|civil law}} [[negligence]]
# [[laziness]], [[idleness]], [[carelessness]]

=====Usage notes=====
The Japanese Wikipedia article [[:ja:w:懈怠 (法学)|懈怠 (法学)]] describing the legal {{m|en|laches}} and {{m|en|negligence}} senses uses the ''ketai'' reading. However, dictionaries tend to list ''kaitai'' as the primary reading for the legal senses.<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|negligence}} {{ja-r|過失|かしつ}}
* {{sense|laziness}} {{ja-r|怠慢|たいまん}}

===Etymology 2===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|懈怠|懈怠 (Buddhism)}}
{{wikipedia|Kausidya|Kausidya (Buddhist spiritual slothfulness)}}
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|け|たい}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かいたい}} compound {{m|zh|懈怠|tr=hɛ<sup>X</sup> doi<sup>X</sup>|lit=idle + negligent}}. A mixed reading, so likely a later development within Japanese. Uses the [[呉音#Japanese|''goon'']] of ''ke'' for the first half, and the [[漢音#Japanese|''kan'on'']] of ''tai'' for the second half.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|けたい|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|けたい}}

# [[laziness]], [[idleness]], [[carelessness]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=けたい|legal}} [[laches]]: a kind of [[lapse]] wherein an opposing party has neglected to invoke its rights within a certain period of time
# {{lb|ja|sort=けたい|civil law}} [[negligence]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=けたい|Buddhism}} [[spiritual]] [[slothfulness]]: [[kausidya]]

=====Usage notes=====
The ''kedai'' reading below is more common for the Buddhist ''[[spiritual]] [[slothfulness]]'' sense.

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|laziness}} {{ja-r|怠慢|たいまん}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|けたい}}

# to be [[lazy]], to be [[careless]]

=====Conjugation=====
{{ja-suru|けたい}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|laziness}} {{ja-r|怠慢|たいまん}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|け|だい}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かいたい}} compound {{m|zh|懈怠|tr=hɛ<sup>X</sup> doi<sup>X</sup>|lit=idle + negligent}}. The [[呉音#Japanese|''goon'']], so likely the original borrowing.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|けだい|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|けだい}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=けだい|Buddhism}} [[spiritual]] [[slothfulness]]: [[kausidya]]
# [[laziness]], [[idleness]], [[carelessness]]

=====Usage notes=====
The ''ketai'' reading above is more common for the {{m|en|laziness}} sense.
